column2: "Yes, yes, this should be enough terrain data for the places Zeno's likely to be running around."
"Thanks for joining me on this one, <%me>."
"But don't mention this to Zeno, okay? We have to do this sort of stuff on the sly. You know, out of sight, out of... er... how does that go again?"
"Well, I'll see you later. I hope we can work together again soon!"
